name: Get In Sync!
description:
Get In Sync is a beat-based game where you use the core ability to Rewind discs to solve interesting puzzles.

Brief: 

- Each level has note discs that keep spinning. Whenever the note hits a receiver, it plays a sound!
- Each level consists of a Beat Indicator at the top. A specific beat will be marked with a note color, signifying that the spinning notes need to be played at the correct time.
- Rewind the rings, such that the notes are played at the perfect moment to solve the puzzle!!

Controls:

- The colored buttons on the left side of the screen allow you to rewind the note discs.
